text: Va ʙidoned, ki haroina, pajomʙari Alloh dar mijoni sumost, hurmati uro nigah dored. Agar dar ʙisjore az korho sumoro ito'at kunad, ʙa masaqqat xohed aftod. Vale Alloh imonro mahʙuʙi sumo soxt va onro dar dilaton ʙijorost va kufru fisqu isjonro dar nazaraton nopisand va zist gardonid. Inho xud ʙa haq rohjoftagonand
